description: Articles imported for exhibition by any institution or society established for the encouragement of agriculture, arts, education or science, or for such exhibition by any State or for a municipal corporation
general: Free, under bond, as prescribed in U.S. note 2 to this subchapter
other: Free, under bond, as prescribed in U.S. note 2 to this subchapter

description: Articles imported by any institution, society or State, or for a municipal corporation, for the purpose of erecting a public monument
general: Free, under bond, as prescribed in U.S. note 2 to this subchapter
other: Free, under bond, as prescribed in U.S. note 2 to this subchapter
